dict.acceptation: 包装，用纸覆盖；贴壁纸；提供纸张；[俚语] 提供免费入场券；
贴糊墙纸；发交通违章传票；
纸制的；似纸的；有名无实的；

sent.orig: Products wanted: Kraft paper, woodfree printing paper, thermal paper and specialty paper and silicon release paper.
sent.trans: 需要货品：牛皮纸、无木印刷纸、热力感应纸及特制纸。

sent.orig: Products wanted: Paper including paper, white paper and art paper.
sent.trans: 需要货品：纸类，包括牛皮纸、白纸及美术纸。

sent.orig: Paper Gummeed Tape, Carbon Paper, Computer Paper, Opffice Stationery, Table Stationery Paper Products.
sent.trans: 采购产品磁带，碳纸，电脑纸，办公文具，表，文具，纸品。

sent.orig: Paper and Paper Boards, Threads, Yarn, Paper, Wood, Yarn and Thread Paper and.
sent.trans: 采购产品纸和纸板，线，纱，纸，木材，纱和线纸。

sent.orig: Finally, sanitary paper has been developed for use in tissue paper, paper toweling and paper napkins.
sent.trans: 最后，清洁纸张被发展成卫生纸、纸毛巾和餐巾纸。
